text: I visited our collaborators at the ICMR- Vector Control Research Centre (VCRC) in Puducherry, India to test the NTDscope for diagnosing lymphatic filariasis
I visited our collaborators at the Higher Institute for Scientific and Medical Research (ISM) in Cameroon to test the NTDscope, our portable microscope for diagnosing neglected tropical diseases
I visited our collaborators at Centre de Recherches Médicales de Lambaréné (CERMEL) in Gabon to test the NTDscope, our portable microscope for diagnosing neglected tropical diseases
I presented our work at the Tropical Infectious Diseases Gordon Research Seminar
I presented our work on machine learning for automated schistosomiasis detection at the American Society for Tropical Medicine and Hygiene 2022 Annual Meeting
I presented our work on harnessing mobile phones for diagnosis of neglected tropical diseases at the UC Berkeley Health Tech Co-Lab Grand Opening
Berkeley Engineering magazine wrote an article about our work!
